channel.title: Hacking Linux on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Hacking Linux on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: booting linux on the PS2
item.description: So I get bored every once and awhile and I want to “hack” stuff. so lately I have been into hacking the ps2 and the tivo. I just ordered a tivo to hack and I just got my “key” to the ps2 world. so yesterday I burnt a couple disks to test out my set up. and wham it worked. I was able to boot the ps2linux rescue disk. however, the HD is not formatted so I wasn’t able to boot BBnav.
